alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; Upper Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 16 at 11:52AM MST until December 17 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 24 below zero. * WHERE...Estancia Valley and Upper Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frostbite and hypothermia are possible if precautions are not taken. Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; Upper Rio Grande Valley
